name: EU Business Group Ltd
goal: The European Union Business Group was formed in early 2015 and is a strategic partner for improving Tanzania's business climate and promoting trade and investment between the two parties. The EUBG aspires to be a frank and reliable partner to engage with the Government but also the Tanzanian private sector on all issues of interest for European investors and overall to promote business environment as a key factor for the social and economic development of Tanzania.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: We do not work with EU institutions - we work with the Government of Tanzania. We liaise and work with the EU delegation to Tanzania on a variety of issues and projects such as policy papers, workshops and dialogue.
